data.text: An excellent 1 night stay, a very comfortable spacious room. For a last limited booking we were very well looked after. The room was setup exactly how I requested. Didn’t really get a chance to explore any hotel facilities but I’m sure they would all be great. Can’t fault Premier Inn. Thank you
data.title: Very Comfortable

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jawed,

Thank you for the fantastic review!

We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Your experience is something that we strive for all our guests to have, and we are incredibly grateful that you have taken the time to write this.

Reading such remarks is not only flattering to the team but highly motivational as well, encouraging them to continue operating at such high levels.

Providing our guests with amazing experiences and ensuring that they are happy is always our top priority. I look forward to welcoming you back in the not-too-distant future, and the team here remains on standby to serve all of your requirements once again!

Best regards,
Eddy
Hotel Operations Manager
owner_response.author: Kshitiz Bist

data.text: This is my amazing trip with premier inn dubai investment park hotel is service is best of the best and everything is pretty perfect thank staff is so active, kind and humble I like to mention the name Ms sheetal Thank you so much, and Thank you all
data.title: Ms sheetal best

data.text: premier in dip is my 1st experience and this is hotel so clean excellent servies ,active staff and heplful ,ms shital so kind and lovely friendly thank you for everything and i will come next time with my family and friends this my solo trip  thanks
data.title: thank you shital
